content.raw:
I recently upgraded my ubuntu 12.04 which was working fine with hydro and drcsim.  After the upgrade I ended up getting the following messages every time I try to use apt-get.  

Is there a dependency issue with one of your released packages?  I remember having a very similar issue during the transition of gazebo 2 to gazebo 3.

You might want to run 'apt-get -f install' to correct these:
The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 drcsim : Depends: ros-hydro-gazebo4-msgs but it is not going to be installed
 gazebo4-plugin-base : Depends: gazebo4 (= 4.0.2-1~precise)
 ros-hydro-gazebo4-plugins : Depends: ros-hydro-gazebo4-msgs but it is not going to be installed
 ros-hydro-gazebo4-ros : Depends: ros-hydro-gazebo4-msgs but it is not going to be installed
E: Unmet dependencies. Try 'apt-get -f install' with no packages (or specify a solution).
content.html:
I recently upgraded my ubuntu 12.04 which was working fine with hydro and drcsim. After the upgrade I ended up getting the following messages every time I try to use apt-get.

Is there a dependency issue with one of your released packages? I remember having a very similar issue during the transition of gazebo 2 to gazebo 3.

You might want to run 'apt-get -f install' to correct these: The following packages have unmet dependencies: drcsim : Depends: ros-hydro-gazebo4-msgs but it is not going to be installed gazebo4-plugin-base : Depends: gazebo4 (= 4.0.2-1~precise) ros-hydro-gazebo4-plugins : Depends: ros-hydro-gazebo4-msgs but it is not going to be installed ros-hydro-gazebo4-ros : Depends: ros-hydro-gazebo4-msgs but it is not going to be installed E: Unmet dependencies. Try 'apt-get -f install' with no packages (or specify a solution).
